description.text:
In addition, a detective's class spell list includes the following:
1st--detect chaos/evil/good/law 2nd--zone of truth 3rd--arcane eye, speak with dead, speak with plants 4th--discern lies 5th--prying eyes, stone tell 6th--discern location, find the path, greater prying eyes, moment of prescience
A detective may add one of these spells or any divination spell on the bard spell list to his list of spells known at 2nd level and every four levels thereafter.
